caption:
In this photograph, four young girls, dressed in green scout uniforms, are seen sitting on the edge of a fountain in an urban setting. Each girl is engaged in a different activity. From left to right: the first girl is using a hand calculator or a similar device; the second is turning her head as if speaking to someone behind her; the third is eating a sandwich; and the fourth is drinking from a can, possibly a soft drink. They appear to be relaxed and enjoying their time at the fountain, which is vigorously spraying water upwards.

Behind them, a vibrant cityscape features tall and dense buildings, suggesting this photo is taken in a downtown area of a large city. The buildings are mostly modern, with dark and light facades often found in urban centers. The fountain itself adds a sense of calmness to the otherwise potentially bustling environment. The time seems to be daylight, with shadows indicating the sun possibly in mid-afternoon position. It's a vivid scene combining elements of youthful leisure and urban life.
title: Girl Scouts lunch alongside Rockefeller Center fountain 5th Avenue side
